titles.title: A bill to convey public land to the Catholic Diocese of Reno/Las Vegas, Nevada.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 100-103.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with amendments. With written report No. 100-195.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 371.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 10/12/1988--Passed Senate amended. (Measure passed Senate, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified lands to the Catholic Diocese of Reno/Las Vegas, Nevada. Requires the Diocese to pay administrative costs of such conveyance.
